articles.description: Hero MotoCorp has finally entered the electric vehicle segment with its all-new Vida V1 electric scooter. This e-scooter is offered in 2 variants – V1 Plus and V1 Pro – and both comes with different specifications and price tags. However, it is relatively exp…
